title: The Ampere Scooter Feature No One Is Talking About
content:
Ampere Electric Scooters 2025

Ampere Electric, now trading under Greaves Electric Mobility, exploded onto the Electric Scooter scene in India and has made a name for itself. The company started with e-cycles and transitioned their entire range of products to lithium-ion scooters after an investment in 2018. The Ampere e-scooter fleet now has Reo, Zeal EX, Magnus EX, Primus, Magnus Neo, Nexus, and concept models being presented at auto expo 2025. Over a substantial period of time, the Ampere brand has built trust to its clients around affordable, sensible pricing and efficiency, while also expanding urban mobility innovation.

Ampere at a Glance: Heritage & Evolution

  • Ampere was founded in 2008 with a focus on electric cycles and scooters for persons with disabilities.
  • Following the investment by Greaves Cotton in 2018 and with prominent figures like Ratan Tata involved, Ampere transitioned to lithium-ion e-scooters.
  • They currently produce from their manufacturing facility at the Ranipet EV Mega Site in Tamil Nadu, as well as a large retail network in India.
  • By 2025 Ampere will have the Reo at the lower end, and the Primus at their highest, and there are new concept rides Nexus Exec, Xyber, Xpress to expand into.

Current Ampere Scooters: Models & Pricing

Model Price (Ex Showroom) Range / Key Stats
Reo One Series ₹59,900 – ₹69,900 ~70 km range, top speed ~25–30 km/h
Magnus EX ₹84,999 – ₹94,900 ~95 km range, top speed ~65 km/h
Primus ₹1.19 – ₹1.46 lakh ~107 km range, top speed ~77 km/h
Magnus Neo ~₹79,999 ~90–100 km range, top speed ~65 km/h
Nexus ₹1.10 – ₹1.25 lakh ~105–136 km range, higher top speed

In Depth Model Insights

Reo Series

  • Entry level, compact and light – ideal for budget conscious urban riders.
  • Accredited as either a lead acid or lithium-ion battery; a 5–6 hour charging time for the lithium version.
  • Top speed limited to around 25 km/h; best suited to fairly short rides.

Magnus EX

  • A well rated mid range option with an 80 to 100 km real world range and 65 km/h top speed.
  • Features include an LED headlamp, USB charging, keyless entry and a Limp Home mode.
  • Some criticism for build quality, no disc brakes, and sporadic service.
  • Owners appreciate portable weight (around 82 kg), but some bad press still for battery degradation and switch failures with longer rides.

Primus

  • Regarded as Ampere's flagship product: 3 kWh LFP battery, 3.8 kW motor, an up to 107 km ARAI certified range.
  • Claims a top speed of 77 km/h and ride modes Eco, City, Power, and reverse mode.
  • Comfort features include alloy wheels and fairly good suspension; some users have pointed out issues with finishing and software.

Magnus Neo

  • In early 2025 at a competitive ₹79,999 price.
  • A 2.3 kWh LFP battery, claimed range of 90 km, maximum speed of 65 km/h, and USB port.
  • Small but ideal utility, three ride modes, reverse, and positive energy efficiency.
  • An achievement is completing a 2,300 km trip from Bengaluru to Delhi, breaking a national record.

Nexus

  • The premium model with a 3 kWh battery and 5 kW motor.
  • Claim of max speed is around 93 km/h and range of about 100-110 km, charge time is ~3.5 h.
  • The 7-inch touchscreen TFT display and smartphone connectivity for the riders who live for the tech and want performance.

Ampere’s Vision at Auto Expo 2025: Future Ready Concepts

Xyber

An electric motorcycle concept that looks slick and has a 10 kW motor, speeds of 100 km/h and a motor range that has a claim of 200 km—it is targeted at thrill-seekers.

Xpress

For delivery, gig economy riders and even firms 230 kg of payloads, electric utility scooter that has a swappable battery with IoT functionality

Nexus Exec / Turismo S

Performance sports versions, with premium styling, integrated riding benefits, and connected cockpit.


What Makes Ampere Stand Out?

  • Range of Choices - Budget friendly Reo to performance Nexus and prestige Primus.
  • Focus on Urban Workhorses - Magnus Neo debunked expectations by proving long-distance, reliable performance
  • Increasing Tech Stack - Connectivity, ride mode options, reverse gears, TFT display, improving the user experience
  • Sales Network - 250+ dealers in Greaves support make service access easier.

What Riders Are Saying

Magnus EX:

  • Lightweight and decent range for quick solo rides is what I was able to achieve but will be limited/rigid over bumps.
  • Build and seat feels cheaper than others; top speed dropped when battery was low

Long Term Experience:

  • 28,000km the throttle and switch panel replacements seem to be pretty frequent. Battery range went from 100km to 30km. Warranty claims are slow.
  • There were mixed reviews for price, performance, durability of the motor, and hardware quality and long term durability.

Choose the Right Ampere for You

  • Budget Runs, Basic Trips: Go with the Reo model.
  • City Daily Commuter: Magnus EX or Magnus Neo, solid range and price.
  • Value Packed Mid Option: The Primus has way better performance and bigger battery.
  • Performance and Tech Lovers: Look for the Nexus with TFT and better speed.
  • Business and delivery: Watch out for the Xpress concept, cargo focused with usability.
  • Really into Early Adopters and People Napping on scooters: Keep watching Xyber and Nexus Exec for potential future.

Final Thoughts

Ampere's path towards 2025 exemplifies a lot of innovation, most of which is genuinely classic innovation when you consider the journey from low cost commuter scooters like Reo to future shocking concepts that will redefine mobility. Ampere has demonstrated how strong unbeatable, with budget focussed offerings, a firm and reliable battery system, and a dependable service ecosystem as the company builds trust as a familiar brand to everyday Indian riders. While user feedback was mixed about build quality and long-term durability gaps, the Ampere family of value-driven EV bundles shines brightly in the Indian EV marketplace. It is a highly viable option for many riders exploring possible ways to switch to an EV.

title: Why Ather 2025 Scooters Are the Smartest EVs on Indian Roads
content:
Ather Electric Scooters 2025

Ather Energy has been around since 2013 and has led the way for India's electric two wheeler revolution with its great designs, game changing technology and performance based brand positioning. In 2025, they continue to dominate the category with their recently launched 450 series (which now features the 450S, 450X, 450 Apex, and the family oriented Rizta) with all of the latest advancements in features, safety, and smart connectivity.

At the beginning of 2025, Ather released a major facelift and solid range of innovations across their lineup, including multi mode traction control, Magic Twist regenerative braking, and the AtherStack 6 software upgrade for their scooters, making them smarter, more efficient, and more enjoyable to ride.

Ather 2025 Model Lineup & Pricing


Model Price (Ex showroom)
450S ₹1,29,999
450X 2.9 kWh ₹1,46,999
450X 3.7 kWh ₹1,56,999
450 Apex ₹1,99,999

The range starts with the 450S, before moving to the luxe tech world of the 450X then to the flagship, the Apex. The Rizta is offered as a family option, plenty of comfort and features for the right price.


Model Price Range (Ex-Showroom) Range (IDC / Claim) Power Output
Rizta ₹1.11–1.46 L ~123 km Entry level, city rides
450S ₹1.26–1.45 L ~115 km Balanced daily commute
450X ₹1.41–1.79 L 126 km / 161 km (2.9 / 3.7 kWh) Flagship, advanced tech
450 Apex Up to ₹2 L Premium, high performance Sport derived features

In Depth Model Breakdown

450S

  • New 3.7 kWh battery option up to 161 km IDC.
  • 5.4 kW motor, with torque of 22 Nm.
  • 0–40 km/h in 3.9 seconds, maximum speed of 90 km/h.
  • Includes ride modes, traction control, Magic Twist braking.

450X

  • Comes with 2.9 kWh (126 km) and 3.7 kWh (161 km) battery.
  • Other features include 7" touchscreen, AtherStack Pro, Google maps navigation, music and calls operating, and theft alerts.
  • Performance: 0–40 km/h in around 3.3 seconds, max speed of 90 km/h.
  • Traction control with Rain, Road, and Rally modes.

450 Apex

  • Touted as Ather's most premium model, it includes the available performance enhancements.
  • Includes all 2025 tech updates and a sporty, refined aesthetic.

Rizta

  • Made for general use, primarily for family and light urban commuters.
  • Variants: Rizta S (~123 km), Rizta Z (~160 km).
  • Features 34L storage, 7 inch TFT (multilingual), and has Navi, Bluetooth, USB charging.
  • Over 1 lakh units in one year from launch.

Common Upgrades Across the 2025 Lineup

  • Multi Mode Traction Control – Adapts your torque in Road, Rain and Rally mode.
  • Magic Twist Regenerative Braking – Force close the throttle and slow down while charging the battery.
  • AtherStack 6 Software: New smarter interface, additional features and OTA updates.
  • Eight70 Battery Warranty – Battery health less than 70% for 8 years or 80,000 km.

Charging, Connectivity & Ecosystem

  • Ather Grid – Fast charging network with over 3,100 locations across the UK.
  • Flexible Charging – Home charger, fast public chargers, community charging points.
  • Assured Buyback – Up to 60% resale after 3 years.
  • 24/7 Roadside Assistance – Covers breakdowns, punctures, and low batteries.

Performance & Riding Experience

  • Fast acceleration: 0–40 km/h in ~3.3–3.9s.
  • Top speed of 90 km/h.
  • Aluminum chassis for lightweight and nimbleness.
  • Regenerative braking to help battery efficiency and life.
  • Connected dashboard - Safe and hands free control.

Ownership Benefits

  • Over 2,900 service and showroom touchpoints across the country.
  • 8 year battery warranty—among the best in the segment.
  • Regular OTA updates for additional performance and features.

How Ather Compares

With regard to premium design, advanced features, and infrastructure for charging, Ather has carved out an incredible position in the marketplace. Some competitors may differentiate their products with a lower up front price, but Ather surpasses the competition in terms of value due to the better performance, reliability and better ownership experiences they deliver.

Final Thoughts

If you are wanting a smart, stylish, high performing electric scooter, Ather's 2025 line up delivers on all these fronts. Budget riders can choose the well priced Rizta, riders that want more utilitarian features can go with the 450S, technology enthusiasts can opt for the well appointed 450X, and performance seekers can choose the Apex. All the Ather products offer premium mix of features, comfort, convenience and technology innovations. Ather products also have excellent charging support, class leading warranties, and have never been in better position with the national presence they’ve built. Ather is the launch pad for the future of electric mobility in India.

title: Why Ather 450X is the Best Electric Scooter for Urban Commuting in 2025
content:
What is the Ather 450X?

The Ather 450X is not simply an electric scooter — it is a future-ready ride made for speed, intelligence and sustainability. The Ather takes off quickly, has an intelligent dash, and is totally emission free. Designed for the fast-paced urban rider who wants style and performance.

The Ather 450X is redefining urban commuting and represents a great product value as a smart electric scooter for modern city commuters who want performance, style, and sustainability. The Ather 450X is one of the best electric scooters in the market today whether you need convenience for daily use, or you want to make the switch to a greener ride. This blog will also help explain the different forms of Ather 450X, define ways it can be used daily, and provide the benefits of adopting this EV bike because it is an intelligent vehicle for urban mobility.

Types of Ather 450X Electric Scooter (2025 Models)

There are two main variants you can choose from:

  • Ather 450X Gen 3: The top end model with a 3.7kWh battery that provides up to 146km range (Under Ideal Driving Conditions). It has a fast charging feature, Warp mode for maximum power and gizmos for the enthusiasts.
  • Ather 450 Plus: A less expensive model with a 2.9kWh battery that gives 115km range. It has greener features also the ride is comfortable but its much less expensive to purchase.
Variant Battery Capacity IDC Range Charging Time Key Features
Ather 450X Gen 3 3.7kWh 146 km ~5hr 40min Fast charging, Warp mode
Ather 450 Plus 2.9kWh 115 km ~5hr 40min Cost-effective, Smart UI

Real Uses of Ather 450X

The Ather 450X is the ideal scooter for urban lifestyles:

  • Daily commuting: Zero fuel costs for getting to the office, college, or travelling within the city
  • Running errands: Easy to pick supplies from the market, getting to appointments or visiting places close by.
  • Leisure riding: Fun to ride around the city thanks to good acceleration and a smooth and silent motor.
  • Smart app integration: Keep track of your battery status, find charging stations, plan routes using Ather app.

Ather 450X – Exclusive Features You Won’t Find Anywhere Else

Not another electric scooter, the Ather 450X is a premium electric vehicle bike that incorporates technology, performance, and connectivity like no other scooter. While there are plenty of information available, there are unique and exclusive differences that we are writing about here that will surely make your blog shine and attract honestly interested readers.

Powerful Motor for Quick Urban Rides

The Ather 450X features a 6.4 kW PMSM electric motor that can reach a top speed of 90 km/h. It is designed for urban areas, having a decent 0-40 km/h acceleration time of 3.3 seconds to allow easy and quick overtakes.

Multiple Riding Modes for Every Need

While many scooters only provide 2 or 3 riding modes, the Ather 450X offers Eco, Ride, Sport, Smart Eco and Warp mode. Whether you're looking to have max range, comfort ability, or max power whenever you need it, there is a mode for you!

Smart Touchscreen Dashboard

It is equipped with a 7 inch full colour TFT dashboard that's powered by a Snapdragon processor, allowing you to view not only your speed and battery capacity, but also:

  • Google Maps navigation
  • Ride Statistics
  • File storage
  • Bluetooth music and call management
  • Over-the-air (OTA) software update capabilities

AtherStack 5 UI – Exclusive Software Platform

The AtherStack 5 UI system that comes installed on your Ather 450X scooter allows for seamless navigation and is constantly being improved through OTA software updates. So unlike with other scooters, the smart features of your scooter will only get smarter through the years, without needing to take a trip down to the service centre.

High-Capacity Battery with Superior Thermal Management

With a 3.7 kWh lithium-ion battery, you can get a distance of around 146 km depending on the driving conditions and how you drive with the advanced heat management system extending the cycle life and reliability of the battery.

Safety & Comfort Innovations

The Ather 450X comes equipped with premium safety technologies:

  • Regenerative braking to get energy back
  • A Combined braking systems
  • Magic Twist throttle with variable responsiveness
  • Rain, Road & Rally traction control
  • Reverse park assist
  • Hill-hold assist
  • Auto cut-off when using the side stand

Key Benefits of Ather 450X

  • Eco-Friendly Travel: With no emissions and less pollution, you are able to travel and stay environmentally friendly.
  • Low Running Costs: Home charging or public charging is always cheaper than petrol.
  • Advanced Technology: With features like the touch screen dashboard interface, integrated Google Maps navigation, OTA updates and ride analytics made available by each ride completed.
  • High Performance: 0 to 40 km/h in 3.3 seconds is a fantastic ride!
  • Stylish and Durable: Built from the best material you are going to spend less time servicing and an scooter like the Ather 450X is built to last!
  • Government subsidies: An electric vehicle subsidy makes purchases of plugs in vehicles affordable for everyday Australians!!

Ather 450X vs Petrol Scooter

Feature Ather 450X Petrol Scooter
Fuel Type Electric Petrol
Running Cost/km ₹0.25 – ₹0.35 ₹1.50 – ₹2.00
Emissions Zero High
Top Speed 90 km/h 80 – 90 km/h
Charging/Fuel Plug & charge Petrol pumps
Noise Level Ultra quiet Noisy engine

The Ather 450X is an eco-friendly, stylish, and affordable ride that is perfect for commuting in the city today. Get this smart electric scooter today and start your green journey!

title: Bajaj Chetak 2025 Experience Power, Style, and Innovation on Two Wheels
content:
Bajaj Chetak Electric Scooter

The Bajaj Auto Chetak Electric is now a modern classic in India's rapidly growing electric two wheeler segment. It combines retro design from the past, solid engineering, good tech features, production quality and exceptional sales. Here, we give a complete, reader oriented breakdown of the Chetak Electric specifications, features, variants, market relevance, and total annual sales no piece of info is left untouched.

Timeless Design Meets Modern Build

As a scooterist, the Chetak Electric maintains the classic, charismatic image with clean body panels with a little modern twist, thanks to a steel unibody chassis. The Chetak Electric incorporates a brilliant LED headlamp with a signature circular DRL. It features:

  • Alloy wheels with tubeless tires
  • Fourteen different color options are available in the variants
  • 35-litre underseat boot space (largest in the segment)
  • Easy ergonomics for rider and pillion

High quality fit, finish, paint, and tactile functions give the Chetak an actual sense of luxury, but the body is the right dimensions for all age groups and family use.

Battery, Motor & Performance

Battery:

  • 3.0 kWh & 3.5 kWh Lithium-ion batteries (varies depending on variant)
  • Usually fixed, placed under the floorboard to get a low centre of gravity and better stability
  • IP67 dust and water resistance make them extremely durable for Indian use

Motor:

  • Hub mounted 4.1 kW and 4.8 kW electric motors (depending on the model/year)
  • Smoother and completely silent operation, instant torque, perfect for zippy city riding.
  • Top speed: 62-63 km/h (perfect speed for city and suburban chores)

Real world range:

  • Older variants: 127 km/charge (IDC)
  • Latest 35 Series: 151-155 km/charge (see IDC/simulated city test); top of segment
  • Usage yields ~100–130km, even in mixed modes

Charging & Usability:

  • Charging time (0–80%): ~3 hr 25 min at home socket, ~full charge ~5–6 hours on home socket
  • Charger: on board 950W portable charger, boot friendly
  • Fast charging can be supported on select variants

Feature Packed for Everyday India

  • Touchscreen 5-inch TFT console: Navigation, Bluetooth calling, music, notifications, ride statistics, speed lock.
  • Digital instrument cluster: Color LCD, real world range, battery conversion % display, tripmeter, clock
  • Hill Hold Assist, Reverse Mode, Ride Modes (Eco, Sport): Practical and intuitive City Solution
  • Smartphone App: Remote lock/unlock, tampering alerts, location tracking, ride history, OTA software updates
  • Safety: Auto hazard lights, disc brake up front (on premium variants), drum brake rear, common braking system, side stand sensor, parking assist
  • Connected via Bluetooth and GSM (in some variants), complete with auto call/SMS alerts

Suspension, Comfort & Practicality

  • Front suspension: Leading link
  • Rear suspension: Single shock absorber
  • Ground clearance: 168mm—moves smoothly over commonly encountered speed breakers, potholes etc.
  • Seat height: Positions rider comfortably regardless of height
  • Kerb weight: Approx. 123–134kg depending on the variant
  • Premium upholstery materials, squared cockpit creating ample legroom, ergonomic handlebar position

Variants, Pricing & Colors

  • Chetak 3001 (2025 model): 3.0 kWh battery, Eco/Sport modes, new for 2025, price around ₹99,900–₹1.07 lakh, replacing 2903
  • Chetak 3503 / 3501: 3.5 kWh battery, premium tech, km/charge, price around ₹1.2–1.46 lakh (ex-showroom)
  • 4 core variants (entry to premium), all with segment leading boot capacity and multiple color options.

Yearly Sales Impact & Market Leadership

  • FY2023: ~71,941 units sold
  • FY2024: ~193,439 units sold—a 169% YoY increase
  • FY2025: ~260,000 units sold (projected and summed for the year)
  • In March 2025, Bajaj sold 34,863 units in a month, a record high and over 1,100 units/day
  • Chetak market share was 26–29% in Q4 and monthly tops; annual share was 19–20%
  • Bajaj beat the 2.5 lakh units annual sales for the first time, catching up on TVS iQube and stepping squarely into segment leader territory

Bajaj Chetak Electric Scooter Sales Growth from FY2023 to FY2025

Comparison with Segment Leaders

Scooter Range Top Speed Battery (kWh) Price (₹, ex-showroom) Notable Features FY2025 Sales
Bajaj Chetak 151–155km 62–63km/h 3.0 / 3.5 99,900–1.46 lakh Touch TFT, Smart App, Largest boot ~260,000
TVS iQube 150km (ST) 82km/h 2.2–5.3 94,434–1.66 lakh TFT, connectivity, practical boot ~273,000
Ola S1 Pro Plus 180km 120km/h 4.0 1.31–1.60 lakh TFT, Bluetooth, fast charging ~210,000

User Experience & Living with Chetak

  • Discrete, quiet ride - zero noise, immediate take off.
  • Family comfort - roomy, safe, easy to ride.
  • Feature rich - TFT, app, navigation and ride modes for everyday convenience.
  • Legendary brand assurance - Bajaj service network, build, quality and customer care.

Conclusion

Bajaj Chetak Electric for 2025 stands alone as a unique once in a generation piece of Indian transport that seamlessly affixes itself to the past and propels you into the future: premium build, segment defining technology, practical experience daily, and sales that seem unstoppable. If you are selecting an electric scooter for India manufactured with India's future in mind, here style, safety, smart devices, and decades of trust exist the Chetak provides the fullest choice for today.

And more, the Chetak legend will continue with the research and development power Bajaj is putting behind its electric vehicle future.

title: Before You Buy Any EV, See What BGauss 2025 Offers
content:
BGauss Electric Scooters 2025

BGauss, part of the RR Global Group based in India, is driven by entrepreneur Hemant Kabra, and delivers stylish, tech forward, and affordable electric scooters designed for the rigours of city streets and semi urban roads. By 2025, BGauss is much more established with flagship models like the RUV 350, MAX C12 and D15 that combined, have established BGauss as an innovative player in the electric scooter market with range, performance and connectivity and smart features all in attractive packages.

Brand DNA: Affordable Innovation for Indian Commuters

BGauss works to provide sleek, tech forward, and practical zero emissions transportation to the masses at a democratic price. The BGauss range is known for low running cost, rugged construction, rapid charging, and low maintenance. BGauss has a very simple vision: to build smart and aspirational electric scooters for the hearts of urban and semi urban India.

2025 Model Lineup & Pricing

Model Price (Approx. Ex-showroom) Key Specs & Highlights
MAX C12i / MAX C12 3.0 ₹99,990 – ₹1.30 lakh Up to 123 km range, removable battery, connected tech
RUV 350 ₹1.10 – ₹1.35 lakh Up to 145 km range, metallic body, advanced UI features
D15 ₹1.46 lakh (approx) Swappable battery, alloy wheels, geofence and smart tech

Model Deep Dive

BGauss MAX C12 3.0

The standout model delivers a 123 km ARAI certified range per charge, which per ARAI, is one of the highest in India in 2025. A 2.7 kW motor powers the vehicle and features a removable lithium-ion battery, smart TFT screen, cruise, reverse, OTA and safety systems including rollover alerts.

BGauss RUV 350

A strong contender with a steel body, large alloys, and broader market appeal. Offers a 145 km range with ARAI certification, which can be useful for longer distances or heavier riding. This is backed up by smart features, such as hill start assist, inbuilt navigation, Bluetooth, reverse, and cruise control options through an underlying connected technology platform.

BGauss D15

Premium product, D15 with a 3.1 kWh swappable battery, alloy wheels, digital cluster, reverse mode, geo fencing, USB port, and a real world range claimed of 115 km is serious specs. Scooter buyers should consider.

Comparisons & Market Positioning

BGauss is going up against the Indian EV challenger with solid range and specs at a better value than the most popular alternatives available at the same price (TVS iQube, Bajaj Chetak or the soon to be released Suzuki e Access). The company is already well established with dealer presence in over 130 cities (and counting) to provide access and post sale support across the country.

Why BGauss Stands Out

Impressive Real World Range

  • MAX C12 3.0: ~125 km
  • RUV 350: up to 145 km
  • D15: ~115 km

Taken together, that is solid confidence to ride with and less regular charging.

Smart, Rider Centric Features

  • Connected technology: TFT displays, Bluetooth, navigation, OTA updates
  • Safety features: Reverse, cruise control, geofence (D15), roll over detection (C12)
  • Convenience features: Removable & swappable batteries, great for charging flexibility.

Urban Ready Design & Comfort

  • The RUV 350 is supported by solid metals frame and has large wide tires which mean comfort in ride and stability.
  • The MAX C12 is compact, stylish, and family friendly with smart technology.

Brand Reliability & Service Access

RR Global’s ecosystem with a robust dealership network means after sales easy to access.

User Impressions

  • BGauss MAX C12 users think the battery life is good and the product design is quiet and family friendly.
    “Fast charging, great for families, and smooth ride.”
  • For RUV 350 feedback on the overall convenience and comfort for city use was good but there some noted hampered value for money.
    “Great for daily rides, though can be a little too heavy to leap-off when parked.”

Which BGauss Scooter Suits You?

  • Most Range & Tech Oriented → MAX C12 3.0
  • Heavy Use & Long Distance Comfort → RUV 350
  • Swappable Battery & Overall Premium Features → D15

Final Thoughts

There is no arguing that in terms of EV ecosystem, BGauss has an attractive offering for 2025 (functionality, suit smart tech capabilities and great overall range)! Models like the MAX C12 3.0 and RUV 350 are practically dull; both models then have a large assortment of function and associated features and the D15 has some potential as an overall premium offering. If you are looking for a reliable electric scooter that embodies today's era of innovation, value, and performance in the Indian market - you should certainly keep an eye on BGauss.
